episodes.title: First Time at Seventh-Day Adventist Church (Is This a Cult?)
episodes.description:
On this Skeptic Sunday episode, I share my thoughts on a visit to a Seventh-Day Adventist church. There were some red flags, and I would love to know if you see them the same way. Please share your thoughts in the comments below!

Also, I have a much better filming setup now! Quality should be more consistent and even better moving forward :)
